m_descr:
This app controls a dimmable light in a smart way in combination with a motion detector. At daytime and detected motion light is switched on for 100%, at night the light turns on for 20% only. If you select a dimmer with local control you can overwrite this automated setting using the local rockers. When overwritten to 0 the motion will not turn it off.

Settings:
  • Select the motion sensor
  • Select the dimmer to control.
  • Change – if needed – the dimmer level for day and night
  • Change – if needed – the time interval for day and night
  • Pick the buttons to control the dimmer

Usage: No element is created.
l_Level: Dimmer levels for day and night
l_Day: The time interval when the light is switched on for Day Level
h_DimmerButton: To generate dimmer button activate module SwitchControlGenerator and then press dimmer button
